entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
